text: Push the Button may refer to: * Push the Button (Money Mark album), 1998 * Push the Button (The Chemical Brothers album), 2005 * "Push the Button" (Sugababes song), 2005 * "Push the Button" (Teapacks song), 2007, Israeli Eurovision song * Ant & Dec's Push the Button, a British game show * "Push the Button", a song by Amy Lee from Aftermath * "Computer Age (Push the Button)", a 1984 song by Newcleus
title: Push the Button
